feed.title: The Silent Developer
feed.subtitle: A website and blog where I discuss software projects I am working on, some of my interests, and my portfolio.

entry.title: Chronicles: Pt 1
entry.content:
When building an RPG there are several ways to design the mechanics. The Dragon Warrior approach or the Final Fantasy system.

The second paragraph is here.
entry.summary: When building an RPG there are several ways to design the mechanics. The Dragon Warrior approach or the Final Fantasy system.
